name: The 3rd International Conference “Plant Nutrition, Growth & Environment Interactions”
content: Efficient plant production and yield is highly dependent on understanding of the basic principles underlying the three-way interaction between the plant development, its nutrition and its interaction with environment. The 3rd International Conference “Plant Nutrition, Growth & Environment Interactions” to be held on February 20-21, 2017 in Vienna Austria will review the state of the art and progress in the knowledge of plant growth, plant responses to nutrition and environment and to set research priorities for the next era of research. The Conference program covers a broad spectrum of topics from plant growth, development and nutrition to plant - environment interactions.
organizers: Vienna International Science Conferences & Events Association (VISCEA)
